title: Super Mario Odyssey is a masterpiece of twists and turns – TechCrunch
description: It’s almost unnerving how good Nintendo is at its job — at least, when the wizards there choose to apply themselves. Super Mario Odyssey is a embarrassment of riches, never failing to surprise for hours and hours and maintaining an unflaggingly positive feeling the entire time. It’s an essential for…
author: Devin Coldewey
